DOC.detailed_description: Recent study establish reliability , validity time course cannabis withdrawal syndrome characterize symptom anxiety , irritability , negative mood , physical symptom decrease appetite . This study investigate effect combine treatment Escitalopram cognitive-behavior therapy alleviate symptom marijuana withdrawal syndrome regular chronic user marijuana . 40 patient blindly randomize either active placebo escitalopram 10mg/day , 12 week follow bt 12 week follow-up . Inclusion criterion include : - Men woman age 20-45 - DSM-IV diagnosis THC dependence . Exclusion criterion include : - Dependence drug alcohol - Bipolar Disorder Schizophrenia , Major depression , suicidal ideation psychotic symptom violent thought - Current treatment anti-depressant medication - Neurological disease - Physical illness ( hypothyroidism , severe anemia , renal failure ) - Past severe effect SSRIs . Outcome measure include : - urine THC analysis every two week - questionnaire assess addiction severity index - depression anxiety .
